DOC.brief_summary: CAD/CAM technology introduce field implant dentistry begin 1990 's ( Priest 2005 ) . Since introduction , use CAD/CAM technology production dental implant restoration rapidly expand . However , little evidence currently present support clinical viability ( Henriksson 2003 , Canullo 2007 ) . Therefore , suggest prospective randomize study include bone level place Straumann implant restore transmucosal element crown fabricate use either CAD/CAM `` Etkon '' technology ( Zirconia abutment ceramic crown ) conventional technique ( Crossfit titanium abutment ceramometal crown ) . The aim randomize controlled clinical trial examine single-tooth implant restoration esthetic zone . An esthetic area define area visible patient 's full smile . [ 3rd ITI consensus conference 2004 ] The rehabilitation fabricate use two different technique . Zirconia CAD/CAM ( ZCC ) implant restoration ( test ) compare Titanium conventionally-fabricated ( TCF ) implant restoration ( control ) use , reproducible esthetic ( objective/subjective ) biologic parameter . This vivo study randomize study two group 15 patient one implant total 30 patient 30 implant . The implant examine successful tissue integration accord criterion success ( Buser et al . 1990 ) every recall visit . In addition , follow parameter evaluate restoration : - Esthetic : A . Objective : PES/WES Score ( Belser et al . 2009 ) 1:1 digital photograph , study cast , spectrophotometric measurement , B. Subjective : VAS questionnaire patient VAS questionnaire expert . - Biologic ( mPI , mB , simplify GI , microbial sample , periapical radiograph DIB , width keratinize facial mucosa ) Finally , evaluation mechanical , biologic technical complication perform every recall visit . Mechanical complication would define complication involve prosthesis abutment screw loosening , fracture veneer material , fracture crown framework , abutment screw fracture , implant fracture . The category biologic complication include complication involve soft tissue ( e.g. , fistula , suppuration , bleeding , gingival inflammation , soft tissue dehiscence ) . Technical complication define related restorative component crown ( e.g . crown emergence profile , abutment crown fit , screw loosening , ceramic fracture ) .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial CAD/CAM Conventionally Fabricated Singl Implant Abutments .
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction Long-term prospective study demonstrate high success rate Straumann implant partially fully edentulous patient early conventional loading ( Salvi et al . 2004 , Lambrecht et al . 2003 , Cochran et al . 2002 , Weber et al . 2000 , Buser et al . 1997 ) . Before introduction CAD/CAM technology field implant dentistry begin 1990 's ( Priest 2005 ) , available approach restore single dental implant either stock cast custom abutment ceramo-metal crown . In spite satisfactory result conventional treatment approach achieve , several disadvantage recognize . First , non tooth-colored abutment posse problem bluish appearance overlie tissue case thin gingival biotype ( Barclay et al . 1996 , Prestipino Ingber , 1996 ) . Second , stock abutment ideal emergence profile achieve ( Daftary 1997 ) , disadvantage reduce use custom abutment . However , custom abutment present disadvantage include possible imprecision fit due inaccuracy associate impression , wax , invest casting procedure negative effect gold alloy peri-implant mucosal barrier demonstrate Abrahamsson 1998 ( Abrahamsson et al 1998 ) . The introduction CAD/CAM technology implant dentistry mean provide high quality restoration . Since introduction , use technology production implant ceramic framework crown especially esthetic region rapidly expand promise esthetic , biologic , mechanical property . Alumina well Zirconia abutment characterize good tissue compatibility ( Abrahamsson et al . 1998 ) . In study Barclay et al 1996 find plaque accumulation score ceramic-coated transmucosal element significantly low record titanium transmucosal element ( Barclay et al . 1996 ) . These result suggest development ceramic implant transmucosal collar may assist plaque control soft tissue-implant interface may favorably influence tissue region ( Barclay et al . 1996 ) . Other study document significant difference plaque accumulation microbial colonization titanium ceramic abutment sample ( Andersson et al . 2003 , Rasperini et al . 1998 ) . The bacterial colonization Zirconia ceramic surface recently study vitro vivo ( Rimondini et al . 2002 ) . The author find , overall , Zirconia ceramic surface develop implant abutment accumulate few bacteria commercially pure titanium , may therefore consider promising material abutment manufacturing ( Rimondini et al . 2002 ) . A comparison record superficial soft tissue response titanium ceramic surface transmucosal element implant reveal significant difference group ( Barclay et al . 1996 , Andersson et al . 2001 ) . Almost marginal bone loss record , indicate stable bone situation ceramic titatium abutment single-tooth implant ( Andersson et al . 2001 ) . However , seem peri-implant soft tissue adjacent titanium ceramic surface may differ feature apparent routine clinical parameter use ( Barclay et al . 1996 ) . Because specific mechanical property , all-ceramic restoration demonstrate low fracture resistance ceramic restoration support metal substructure . The ceramic abutment implant sensitive fracture handle procedure titanium abutment ( Andersson et al . 2001 ) . However , advance make fabrication high-strength all-ceramic abutment anterior implant ( Yildirim et al . 2003 ) . The hardness Zirconium ceramic also allow undergo conventional prophylaxis ultrasonic scaler without alteration surface quality abutment ( Marzouk , 1996 ) . Moreover , Zirconia flexural strength fracture toughness almost twice high alumina ( Glauser et al . 2004 , Yildirim et al . 2003 ) . Currently limited number clinical study present support clinical viability CAD/CAM ceramic restoration ( Henriksson 2003 , Canullo 2007 ) report find performance CAD/CAM ceramic implant restoration comparison conventional implant restoration . Objective : The aim randomize controlled clinical trial examine single-tooth implant abutment restoration esthetic zone . Restorations fabricate use two different technique . Zirconia CAD/CAM ( ZCC ) implant abutment restoration compare conventional , prefabricated Titanium ( TCF ) implant abutment porcelain-fused-to-metal restoration use reproducible aesthetic ( objective/subjective ) biologic parameter . Hypothesis : The hypothesis investigation ZCC implant abutments/restorations ( test group ) achieve good biologic esthetic outcome compare TCF type ( control group ) . The null hypothesis define follow : ZCC implant abutments/restorations TCF implant restoration indistinguishable biologic esthetic outcome compare . Clinical Significance : CAD/CAM technology involve fabrication dental abutment restoration purpose improve biologic esthetic result . This assumption formulate primarily subjective interpretation objective assessment randomize controlled trial sparse best . This study significant clinical dentistry create evidence clinical long-term performance Zirconium CAD/CAM abutment ceramic crown compare stock titanium abutment porcelain-fused-to-metal restoration use subjective objective evaluation parameter statistically compare . Adequate band keratinize mucosa ( least 2mm ) 5 . Full Mouth Plaque Scores ( FMPS ) Full Mouth Bleeding Scores ( FMBS ) < 25 % Exclusion criteria General : 1 . Heavy smoker ( 10 cigarettes/day ) 2 . Presence condition require chronic prophylactic use antibiotic 3 . Medical condition require prolong use steroid . 4 . History radiation therapy head neck history chemotherapy . 5 . Physical handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene . 6 . Patients inadequate oral hygiene . Local : 1 . Adjacent implant 2 . Presence periapical radiolucencies adjacent teeth 3 . Missing adjacent teeth 4 . Local inflammation , include untreated periodontitis . 5 . Persistent intraoral infection . 6 . Untreated mucosal disease . DOC.criteria: General : 1 . Age > 21 year 2 . Absence relevant medical condition 3 . Absence periodontal disease 4 . The oppose dentition must natural teeth fix ( removable ) restoration teeth implant . 5 . Availability 5year followup Local : 1 . One miss tooth esthetic zone . An esthetic area define area visible patient 's full smile . [ 3rd ITI consensus conference 2004 ] 2 . Presence two intact adjacent teeth either nonrestored minor restoration ( small composite restoration ) 3 . Adequate native bone achieve primary stability 4 . Adequate band keratinize mucosa ( least 2mm ) 5 . Full Mouth Plaque Scores ( FMPS ) Full Mouth Bleeding Scores ( FMBS ) < 25 % Exclusion criteria General : 1 . Heavy smoker ( 10 cigarettes/day ) 2 . Presence condition require chronic prophylactic use antibiotic 3 . Medical condition require prolong use steroid . 4 . History radiation therapy head neck history chemotherapy . 5 . Physical handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene . 6 . Patients inadequate oral hygiene . Local : 1 . Adjacent implant 2 . Presence periapical radiolucencies adjacent teeth 3 . Missing adjacent teeth 4 . Local inflammation , include untreated periodontitis . 5 . Persistent intraoral infection . 6 . Untreated mucosal disease .
